+00000a60: 223e 0a3c 2f70 3e0a 0a0a 496e 2074 6869  ">.</p>...In thi
+00000a70: 7320 6578 616d 706c 6520 7765 2069 6d70  s example we imp

+00000a90: 7a61 7469 6f6e 2d62 6173 6564 2049 4b20  zation-based IK 
+00000aa0: 7072 6f62 6c65 6d2e 0a54 6865 2070 726f  problem..The pro
+00000ab0: 626c 656d 2063 6f6d 7075 7465 7320 616e  blem computes an
+00000ac0: 206f 7074 696d 616c 206a 6f69 6e74 2063   optimal joint c
+00000ad0: 6f6e 6669 6775 7261 7469 6f6e 2024 715e  onfiguration $q^
+00000ae0: 2a5c 696e 5c6d 6174 6862 627b 527d 5e6e  *\in\mathbb{R}^n
+00000af0: 2420 6769 7665 6e20 6279 0a0a 2424 0a71  $ given by..$$.q
+00000b00: 5e2a 203d 205c 756e 6465 7273 6574 7b71  ^* = \underset{q
+00000b10: 7d7b 5c74 6578 747b 6172 677d 5c6d 696e  }{\text{arg}\min
+00000b20: 7d7e 5c7c 5c7c 7120 2d20 715f 4e5c 7c5c  }~\|\|q - q_N\|\
+00000b30: 7c5e 325c 7175 6164 5c74 6578 747b 7375  |^2\quad\text{su
+00000b40: 626a 6563 7420 746f 7d5c 7175 6164 2070  bject to}\quad p
+00000b50: 2871 2920 3d20 705f 672c 2071 5e2d 5c6c  (q) = p_g, q^-\l
+00000b60: 6571 2071 205c 6c65 7120 715e 2b0a 2424  eq q \leq q^+.$$
+00000b70: 0a0a 7768 6572 650a 2a20 2471 5c69 6e5c  ..where.* $q\in\
+00000b80: 6d61 7468 6262 7b52 7d5e 6e24 2069 7320  mathbb{R}^n$ is 
+00000b90: 7468 6520 6a6f 696e 7420 636f 6e66 6967  the joint config
+00000ba0: 7572 6174 696f 6e20 666f 7220 616e 2024  uration for an $
+00000bb0: 6e24 2d64 6f66 2072 6f62 6f74 2028 696e  n$-dof robot (in
+00000bc0: 206f 7572 2065 7861 6d70 6c65 2c20 7765   our example, we
+00000bd0: 2075 7365 2074 6865 204b 554b 4120 4c57   use the KUKA LW
+00000be0: 5220 696e 2074 6865 2061 626f 7665 2066  R in the above f
+00000bf0: 6967 7572 6520 7769 7468 2024 6e3d 3724  igure with $n=7$
+00000c00: 292c 0a2a 2024 715f 4e5c 696e 5c6d 6174  ),.* $q_N\in\mat
+00000c10: 6862 627b 527d 5e6e 2420 6973 2061 206e  hbb{R}^n$ is a n
+00000c20: 6f6d 696e 616c 206a 6f69 6e74 2063 6f6e  ominal joint con
+00000c30: 6669 6775 7261 7469 6f6e 2c0a 2a20 245c  figuration,.* $\
+00000c40: 7c5c 7c5c 6364 6f74 5c7c 5c7c 2420 6973  |\|\cdot\|\|$ is
+00000c50: 2074 6865 2045 7563 6c69 6465 616e 206e   the Euclidean n
+00000c60: 6f72 6d2c 0a2a 2024 703a 205c 6d61 7468  orm,.* $p: \math
+00000c70: 6262 7b52 7d5e 6e5c 7269 6768 7461 7272  bb{R}^n\rightarr
+00000c80: 6f77 5c6d 6174 6862 627b 527d 5e33 2420  ow\mathbb{R}^3$ 
+00000c90: 636f 6d70 7574 6573 2074 6865 2065 6e64  computes the end
+00000ca0: 2d65 6666 6563 746f 7220 706f 7369 7469  -effector positi
+00000cb0: 6f6e 2076 6961 2074 6865 2066 6f72 7761  on via the forwa
+00000cc0: 7264 206b 696e 656d 6174 6963 732c 0a2a  rd kinematics,.*
+00000cd0: 2024 705f 675c 696e 5c6d 6174 6862 627b   $p_g\in\mathbb{
+00000ce0: 527d 5e33 2420 6973 2061 2067 6f61 6c20  R}^3$ is a goal 
+00000cf0: 706f 7369 7469 6f6e 2c20 616e 640a 2a20  position, and.* 
+00000d00: 2471 5e2d 2c20 715e 2b5c 696e 5c6d 6174  $q^-, q^+\in\mat
+00000d10: 6862 627b 527d 5e6e 2420 6973 2074 6865  hbb{R}^n$ is the
+00000d20: 206c 6f77 6572 2061 6e64 2075 7070 6572   lower and upper
+00000d30: 206a 6f69 6e74 2070 6f73 6974 696f 6e20   joint position 
+00000d40: 6c69 6d69 7473 2072 6573 7065 6374 6976  limits respectiv
+00000d50: 656c 792e 0a0a 5468 6520 6578 616d 706c  ely...The exampl
+00000d60: 6520 7072 6f62 6c65 6d20 6861 7320 6120  e problem has a
